amendment.description: An amendment numbered 56 printed in Part D of House Report 118-216 to prohibit economic support funds from being obligated or expended to Mexico under Chapter 4 of Part II of the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mooney amendment (A031) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Mooney amendment (A031) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Mooney amendment (A031) Agreed to by voice vote.
